resources.string: Kudingeka ukubonisa ubuso bewashi esikrinini sakho sasekhaya. Lolu hlelo lokusebenza aluqoki noma alurekhodi noma yikuphi okuqukethwe kwesikrini.
Kusetshenziselwa ukuthola ukuthi usesikrinini sasekhaya nini ukuze ushintshe isembozo sewashi. Akukho ukufinyelela kwemininingwane yomuntu siqu.
